statements: SELECT * FROM patient_data
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_data WHERE age > 30
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE diagnosis = 'Fever' OR diagnosis = 'Cold'
SELECT patient_name, treatment FROM patient_data ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT diagnosis FROM patient_data WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis, treatment FROM patient_data WHERE age < 20 ORDER BY patient_id ASC
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Male' AND diagnosis LIKE '%flu%'
SELECT * FROM patient_demographics;
SELECT patient_name, dob FROM patient_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, address FROM patient_demographics ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT diagnosis_name, date_diagnosed FROM patient_diagnoses WHERE severity = 'High' ORDER BY date_diagnosed ASC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis_name, date_diagnosed FROM patient_demographics JOIN patient_diagnoses ON patient_demographics.patient_id = patient_diagnoses.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patient_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, dob FROM patient_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis_name, severity FROM patient_diagnoses WHERE date_diagnosed < '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis_name, severity FROM patient_demographics JOIN patient_diagnoses ON patient_demographics.patient_id = patient_diagnoses.patient_id;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, address FROM patient_demographics WHERE dob BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis_name FROM patients INNER JOIN diagnoses ON patients.patient_id = diagnoses.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_result FROM patients INNER JOIN treatment_outcomes ON patients.patient_id = treatment_outcomes.patient_id WHERE treatment_result = 'Successful';

SELECT patient_id, patient_name, diagnosis_name, treatment_result FROM patients INNER JOIN diagnoses ON patients.patient_id = diagnoses.patient_id INNER JOIN treatment_outcomes ON patients.patient_id = treatment_outcomes.patient_id ORDER BY diagnosis_date ASC, treatment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_gender='Male';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, diagnosis_name FROM patients JOIN diagnoses ON patients.patient_id = diagnoses.patient_id WHERE patient_age > 30;

SELECT patient_name, diagnosis_name, treatment_result FROM patients JOIN diagnoses ON patients.patient_id = diagnoses.patient_id JOIN treatment_outcomes ON diagnoses.diagnosis_id = treatment_outcomes.diagnosis_id WHERE patient_age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis_date FROM patients JOIN diagnoses ON patients.patient_id = diagnoses.patient_id WHERE diagnosis_name LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT patient_name, treatment_result FROM patients JOIN treatment_outcomes ON patients.patient_id = treatment_outcomes.patient_id WHERE treatment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, address FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM Treatments WHERE date_completed IS NOT NULL;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, date_diagnosed FROM Patients JOIN Diagnoses ON Patients.patient_id = Diagnoses.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth > '1980-01-01';
SELECT T.patient_id, T.treatment, D.diagnosis FROM Treatments T JOIN Diagnoses D ON T.patient_id = D.patient_id;
SELECT P.patient_name, O.outcome FROM Patients P JOIN Outcomes O ON P.patient_id = O.patient_id WHERE O.date_recorded > '2021-01-01';
SELECT D.diagnosis, T.treatment, O.outcome FROM Diagnoses D JOIN Treatments T ON D.patient_id = T.patient_id JOIN Outcomes O ON D.patient_id = O.patient_id WHERE T.date_completed IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM patient_demographics LIMIT 10
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_demographics WHERE age > 30
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patient_demographics ORDER BY patient_name DESC
SELECT diagnosis, diagnosis_date FROM diagnoses WHERE diagnosis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT admin_name, department FROM admins
SELECT * FROM patient_demographics;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender, date_of_birth FROM patient_demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;

SELECT p.patient_name, d.diagnosis, t.treatment FROM patient_demographics p JOIN diagnoses d ON p.patient_id = d.patient_id JOIN treatment_outcomes t ON p.patient_id = t.patient_id WHERE d.diagnosis_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT r.report_id, r.report_type, a.admin_name FROM admins a JOIN reports r ON a.admin_id = r.admin_id WHERE a.department = 'HR' ORDER BY r.report_date DESC;

SELECT patient_name, age, gender, COUNT(*) AS diagnosis_count FROM patient_demographics p JOIN diagnoses d ON p.patient_id = d.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name, age, gender HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY diagnosis_count DESC;
